title: Savannah at Midnight
description: Forgetting her was his punishment.Never forgetting him was hers.Lovers meet in a sultry city when the clock strikes twelve...Welcome to Savannah where the scenery is beautiful, the air is humid, and spirits both good and evil abound. The locals are friendly and the food is delicious, but don't take advantage of their hospitality. And if you come across a lovely young woman named after the city, you had best mind your manners. Especially at night when the shadows come out to play.
author: Cathleen Maza
